lead_paragraph: Kenya's team have sent their track and field manager home from Rio, Olympics bosses said on Sunday, after allegations he requested money to let undercover journalists, posing as athlete representatives, know when drugs testers would come calling.

headline.print_headline: Kenya Sends Athletics Manager Home Over Doping Allegations-IOC
headline.main: Kenya Sends Athletics Manager Home Over Doping Allegations-IOC

snippet: Kenya's team have sent their track and field manager home from Rio, Olympics bosses said on Sunday, after allegations he requested money to let undercover journalists, posing as athlete representatives, know when drugs testers would come calling....
